issue.title: [Rust] Release 0.11.0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3601](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3601). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to update the release version in the Cargo.toml file and then release to crates.io once this has been merged to master.

I will also document the release process as part of the PR.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3601?focusedCommentId=16661556) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
PR to update README with instructions: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2823

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3601?focusedCommentId=16661943) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
0.11.0 and 0.11.1 are released, so you can post these to crates.io

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3601?focusedCommentId=16680548) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2823
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2823>
